text: ABS_CALL = the MAS 5.0 detection call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)
DETECTION P-VALUE = 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.text: Transfer to air (400 ppm CO2) for 2 days in long day regime (16h light/8h dark)
Transfer to air (400 ppm CO2) for 4 days in long day regime (16h light/8h dark)
Transfer to air (400 ppm CO2) for 2 days in short day regime (8h light/16h dark)

Plants were grown for five weeks in soil at high CO2 concentration (3000 ppm) in a short day regime (8h light/16h dark), 20 C/18 C, 65% relative humidity, 200 umol.m-2.s-1 irradiance at the leaf surface.

RNA was isolated using TRIzol Reagent (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA) and further purified using Qiagen RNeasy MiniElute Columns. Concentration and quality of the RNA was determined with a Nanodrop ND 1000 spectrophotometer and quality was examined using the RNA 6000 Nano Assay (Agilent Technologies 2100 Bioanalyzer).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 2 microg total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 10 microg of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 C and at 60 rounds/min. The GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400 and 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
RMA-normalized expression values as obtained with the affy package of BioConductor. The reported values are on log2-scale.
Transfer to air (400 ppm CO2) for 4 days in short day regime (8h light/16h dark)
